name: greedyNES
description:
IMPORTANT THING I FORGOT TO MENTION IN THE GAME :

YOU CAN EITHER PLAY WITH WASD + Q(=A) + E(=B) OR WITH A GAME CONTROLLER

I made this game alone in a few days, couldn't perfect and polish it as much as I wanted as I'm currently in an exam period so I can't really spend much time on creating games.

Didn't have time to really balance the game so the Zombie might be a difficult enemy to pass, some relics are too op like "Drain" which can litteraly make it so that you can't die.

Be sure to read the How To Play guide in the menu, I will add more explanations here when my important exams are over.

Hope you enjot playing it, I will release a database of ennemies / skills / stats effects if needed.

I used 2 sounds from freesound.org (the explosion and the menu sound)
